item.title: Android OpenGL ES2.0 Template
item.description: Learning OpenGLES 2.0 is easier on Android than on iOS because we can directly focus on OpenGLES implementation rather than wasting time on making the EGL bingings working properly. EGL stuffs are taken care of by android.opengl.GLSurfaceView. OpenGL ES2.0 API is provided by ‘android.opengl.GLES20’ package. The naming convention sticks to the C version.
